prompt_ru: Позволь мне привести тебе еще один пример!

answer_en: When you listen to other people's advice, it doesn't mean that you need to do it
transcription: [wen ju: ˈlɪsn tu: ˈʌðə ˈpi:plz ədˈvaɪs, ɪt dʌznt mi:n ðæt ju: ni:d tu: du: ɪt]

answer_en: It seems to me that you can compare different methods and choose what suits you better
transcription: [ɪt si:mz tu: mi: ðæt ju: kæn kəmˈpeə ˈdɪfrənt ˈmeθədz ænd ʧu:z wɒt sju:ts ju: ˈbetə]

answer_en: I hear it very clearly
transcription: [aɪ hɪər ɪt ˈveri ˈklɪəli]

prompt_ru: Я хотел бы выразить свою личную точку зрения
answer_en: I'd like to express my personal point of view
transcription: [aɪd laɪk tu: ɪksˈpres maɪ ˈpɜ:snl pɔɪnt ɒv vju:]

prompt_ru: Кто платит за это?
answer_en: Who pays for it?
transcription: [hu: peɪz fɔ: ɪt?]

prompt_ru: Он обычно ездит на работу
answer_en: He usually drives to work
transcription: [hi: ˈju:ʒʊəli draɪvz tu: wɜ:k]

prompt_ru: Она поет как настоящая звезда
answer_en: She sings like a real star
transcription: [ʃi: sɪŋz laɪk ə rɪəl stɑ:]
